title: Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s
medium:
Medium: wool, silk thread, glass beads
Technique: embroidery on twill weave
description: Grey fabric partially embroidered in a diaper pattern worked in white silk thread and punctuated with a single bead in each diamond. Beads in a repeating triangle pattern run along one edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s. Medium: wool, silk thread, glass beads
Technique: embroidery on twill weave. Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-38.
